mutants.code:
def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 / n2
    remainder = n1 - n2 * quotient
    return remainder

def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 * n2
    remainder = n1 - n2 * quotient
    return remainder

def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 // n2
    remainder = n1 + n2 * quotient
    return remainder

def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 // n2
    remainder = n1 * (n2 * quotient)
    return remainder

def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 // n2
    remainder = n1 - n2 / quotient
    return remainder

def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 // n2
    remainder = n1 - (n2 + quotient)
    return remainder

def calculate_modulus(n1, n2):
    quotient = n1 // n2
    remainder = n1 - n2 ** quotient
    return remainder
